| HistoryText             = After the [[Siege (Event)|Siege of Asgard]] and [[Norman Osborn (Earth-616)|Norman Osborn]]'s decommission as director of [[H.A.M.M.E.R. (Earth-616)|H.A.M.M.E.R.]], the United States Departament of Defense acquisitioned propietary hardware, including the [[Iron Patriot Armor Model 1]]. Some modifications were made in order to turn it into a drone, including the addition of a base-level A.I. which piloted itself.

[[File:Secret Avengers Vol 2 4 Textless.jpg|thumb|left|Versus the Hulk]]
At a weapons expo, A.I.M. incited a conflict against [[Daisy Johnson (Earth-616)|Daisy Johnson]] and [[Nicholas Fury, Jr. (Earth-616)|Nick Fury, Jr.]], and used the confusion created to steal the Iron Patriot Drone in exposition.{{r|Secret Avengers Vol 2 3}} The terrorist organization managed grow the armor low-level A.I. considerably and free the entire in-development fleet from a factory assembly in [[China]], using the army of sentient drones to incriminate the United States in numerous international attacks. [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] sent the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] to destroy an army of droids that were going to attack [[Iran]], and they were successufully disabled by Banner.

[[File:James Rhodes (Earth-616) from Secret Avengers Vol 2 6 001.jpg|thumb|right|New leader]]
Meanwhile, S.H.I.E.L.D. Intel came to the conclusion the Iron Patriot androids could be reasoned with, and agent [[Phillip Coulson (Earth-616)|Phil Coulson]] asked [[James Rhodes (Earth-616)|Colonel James Rhodes]] to talk to them, as he had experience and military training.{{r|Secret Avengers Vol 2 4}} 

Using holographic communication, S.H.I.E.L.D. hacked into A.I.M.'s network and allowed Rhodes to talk to the suits, who recognized him as "the Pilot", along Tony Stark being "the Maker". Rhodey managed to make the Iron Patriot army understand their actions of abruplty attacking tactical points of enemies of the US was unacceptable, and stated he could teach them better if he could show them, for what the androids sent Rhodes a different version of the Iron Patriot armor.{{r|Secret Avengers Vol 2 6}} With the army of droids at his command, Iron Patriot helped the [[Secret Avengers (S.H.I.E.L.D.) (Earth-616)|Secret Avengers]] in their assault on [[Barbuda|A.I.M. Island]].{{r|Secret Avengers Vol 2 7}}

All of the Iron Patriot Drones were disabled and badly damaged when the Secret Avengers were confronted by a vengeful [[Inhuman (Inhomo supremis)|Inhuman]] known as the [[Gavrel Achter (Earth-616)|Junkman]] who possessed the power of technopathy.{{r|Secret Avengers Vol 2 10}}
